vlive.korean: 내가 제일 억울해 지금 뭘 너네가... I'm the most innocent one here. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 🍊Happy SeungKwan Day🍊

vlive.korean: 지금은 어디 있어요? - 억울해요, 지금이요? Where is it now? - I am innocent. Now? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈&휴닝카이 : 뚝딱뚝딱 공작시간

vlive.korean: 아니 이게 내가 억울하지 니가 억울해요? 이게 말이나 됩니까? I think it is unfair! You are? Does this make sense? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Brown Eyed Girls X Eating Show - 브라운 아이드 걸스 X 같이 먹어요

vlive.korean: 솔직히 나... - 너무 억울해? To be honest... - Not fair? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]SINGING ROOM X fromis_9 - 코인노래방 X 프로미스나인

vlive.english: I wasn't laughing. - You think this is not fair?

examples.korean: It galls me to have to apologize to her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 그녀에게 사과를 해야 하다니 억울해. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It galls me to have to apologize to her. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I detect an undercurrent of resentment towards the new proposals. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그 새 제안들에 대해 억울해 하는 암류가 감지된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I detect an undercurrent of resentment towards the new proposals. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She is very bitter about losing her job. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 직장을 잃은[실직한] 것을 몹시 억울해 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She is very bitter about losing her job. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She has every right to feel hard done by—her parents have given her nothing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 충분히 억울해 할 만도 하다. 그녀의 부모가 그녀에게 아무것도 준 게 없으니. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has every right to feel hard done by—her parents have given her nothing. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She needs to move on with her life and stop being so bitter. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그만 억울해 하고, 인생 앞으로 나아가야 해. DARAKWON
examples.english: She needs to move on with her life and stop being so bitter. Add to Wordbook
